feed.title: Paperless GPT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Azure Document Intelligence
entry.content:
New Features

  • Introduced Azure Document Intelligence as a new OCR provider, enhancing document processing capabilities.
  • Improved configuration with dedicated environment variables for Azure integration and robust error handling.

What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update module github.com/tmc/langchaingo to v0.1.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/243
  • chore(deps): update react monorepo to v19.0.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/242
  • chore(deps): update alpine docker tag to v3.21.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/240
  • chore(deps): update dependency go to v1.24.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/225
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v22.13.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/238
  • chore(deps): update dependency postcss to v8.5.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/220
  • Potential fix for code scanning alert no. 3: Clear-text logging of sensitive information by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/247
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript-eslint to v8.24.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/249
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-router-dom to v7.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/250
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/253
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-icons to v5.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/251
  • chore(deps): update dependency globals to v16 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/257
  • fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/api to v0.222.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/256
  • chore(deps): update dependency postcss to v8.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/255
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/263
  • chore(deps): update eslint monorepo to v9.21.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/259
  • fix(deps): update dependency axios to v1.8.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/265
  • fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/api to v0.223.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/264
  • chore(deps): update dependency @playwright/test to v1.51.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/272
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/271
  • fix(deps): update module golang.org/x/sync to v0.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/274
  • chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.24.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/270
  • chore(deps): update dependency go to v1.24.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/269
  • feat(ocr): enhance OCR processing with structured results and hOCR suâ€¦ by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/212
  • feat(ocr): add support for Azure Document Intelligence provider by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/279

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.12.2...v0.13.0

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Automatic creation date generation
entry.content:
New Feature: Automatic creation date generation

Weird creation dates in paperless-ngx? Have no fear, the LLM comes to rescue ðŸ’¯ ðŸš€ Introduced automatic creation date generation for documents with new UI controls and suggestion handling. (by @AxcellF in #303)

What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency autoprefixer to v10.4.21 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/278
  • fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/api to v0.224.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/276
  • fix(deps): update dependency axios to v1.8.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/275
  • chore(deps): update eslint monorepo to v9.22.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/277
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-router-dom to v7.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/273
  • fix(deps): update dependency axios to v1.8.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/285
  • fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/api to v0.225.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/284
  • chore(deps): update dependency testcontainers to v10.19.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/283
  • chore(deps): update dependency node to v22 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/282
  • fix(deps): update module cloud.google.com/go/documentai to v1.35.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/288
  • chore(deps): update react monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/266
  • Generate created date (#303) by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/304

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.13.0...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.14.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update dependency axios to v1.8.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/300
  • chore(deps): update dependency @vitejs/plugin-react-swc to v3.8.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/299
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/react to v19.0.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/298
  • chore(deps): update dependency @playwright/test to v1.51.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/296
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-router-dom to v7.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/307
  • chore(deps): update eslint monorepo to v9.23.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/306
  • chore(deps): update dependency testcontainers to v10.21.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/292
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/289
  • fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/api to v0.227.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/286
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/308
  • fix(deps): update module cloud.google.com/go/documentai to v1.36.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/309
  • chore(deps): update dependency testcontainers to v10.22.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/310
  • [fix for #311] CreatedDatePrompt to derive date when no day or month were pâ€¦ by @hensing in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/312

New Contributors

  • @hensing made their first contribution in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/312

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • HOTFIX - make auto-process not silently fail on document update failure (=endless loop) by @thiscantbeserious in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/319

New Contributors

  • @thiscantbeserious made their first contribution in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/319

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.14.1...v0.14.2

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Fix custom OCR prompt + stability improvements
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/320
  • Refactor - Move background logic to background.go (and background_test.go) by @thiscantbeserious in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/321
  • fix(ocr): Fix custom OCR prompt by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/323

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.14.2...v0.14.3
